page.title: 07My Favourite Clubs
page.content: On Thursdays I go to gymnastics at Chequers Gym.When I get home from school I put on my tracksuit and Mummy takes me to the gym.We get the apparatus out and do tumble runs,rolls,cartwheels,backward rolls and then with the springboard we do stretch jumps.We enter competitions and we practise hard because we want to win but I haven't won yet.On Fridays at 6.30 I go to Beavers.We do many interesting things.We paint,cook and play football.Sometimes we go out for trips.We have been to the West Midland Safari Park where we saw many animals.Once we wrote to the Captain of Beavers and he sent us a leaflet with a picture of the ship H.M.S.Beaver.
